short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily hide the Blocked section on Discord. Keep in mind that it doesn't really remove the blocked section, it just hides it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocking someone on Discord moves them to the Blocked section instead of getting rid of them completely. Why the section exists is a huge mystery but this extension let's you get rid of that section. No more peaking into the Blocked section!
